title: i have never bought a piece of music in my entire life
body:
But I just bought God, Money, War by King Los.

You kiddies need to stop watching ur hentai animes and start listening to some real music.

replies.body:
Way to go ape for no apparent reason in the second sentence.

But yer, buying music is definitely cool, I am just among the hopeless cheapo bums who downloads them though.
Much relevant to a forum about a game :D
